## Get in Touch with LMSP-Tanzania

We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about Local Marine Spatial Planning, want to contribute to our work, or are interested in collaboration, please reach out.

### Contact Information

**Email:** [lmsp.tanzania@example.com](mailto:lmsp.tanzania@example.com)

**Phone:** +255 [phone number]

**Location:** [City, Tanzania]

### Ways to Connect

- **Ask a Question** - Have a question about MSP? Submit it through our [FAQ form](faq.qmd)
- **Participate in Polls** - Share your views on MSP priorities through our [community surveys](polls.qmd)
- **Submit News** - Have a success story or update to share? [Send it to us](mailto:gemsp.tanzania@example.com)
- **Request Resources** - Need specific data or publications? [Make a request](mailto:gemsp.tanzania@example.com)
- **Partnership Inquiry** - Interested in collaborating? [Contact us](mailto:gemsp.tanzania@example.com)

### Response Time

We aim to respond to all inquiries within 5 business days.
